author: Martin Beckford, Liz Hull
description: Many have told Halifax they are closing their accounts after bank staff were encouraged to display their preferred gender pronouns on name badges. Over 150 people said they will boycott them.
title: Halifax exodus over bank's woke badges amid outcry after decision urging staff to share pronouns
content:
One of Britain's biggest banks has seen a mass exodus of customers after it told those who disagree with its latest woke policy to go elsewhere.

author: Jessica Beard
description: House price growth slows as rising costs bite
title: 'There is nowhere for house prices to go but down'
content:
The cost-of-living crisis and rising interest rates have started to cool the housing market, as the rate of price growth has fallen to its lowest level this year.
